title: Time of Day Greeting
description: Develop a program that takes in the current hour and prints out a greeting message. If the hour is between 6 and 11, the message should be 'Good morning!', if it's between 12 and 16, the message should be 'Good afternoon!', if it's between 17 and 20, the message should be 'Good evening!', otherwise the message should be 'Good night!'
